Hello Anil,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00431822. We haven’t
heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need
assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please
let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the
ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions.
We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

*Ticket Number:* 00431822
*Ticket Subject:* Install DLP agent on Ubuntu for 23.4 AND Ubuntu 24
*Ticket Details:* Hi Team,

I've to install DLP endpoint protector on Ubuntu versions 23 & 24, Could
you provide scripts for the same?

Also One more concern, We've recently renamed our host-names in our
organization and and they already have DLP agent, and we have to make the
policies department wise again, but when I'm searching by new host-names, I
am not getting while creating custom policy.

Could you please help me for the same.

Thanks

Thank you!

Alin Anca
